content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Area (Position x=0-2)
Consists of two stone furnaces for smelting iron:
- Stone furnace 1 at position(0,0)
- Stone furnace 2 at position(2,0)

### Copper Smelting Area (Position x=4, y=4)
- Stone furnace at position(4,4) dedicated to smelting copper ore

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at position(6.5,11.5) containing iron plates and copper cables
- Burner inserter at position(7.5,11.5) moving materials from input chest
- Assembling machine 1 at position(9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5,11.5) moving finished products
- Output chest at position(12.5,11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-26.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5,24.5)
- Pipe network carrying water from pump to boiler
- Boiler at position(-7.0,24.5)
- Steam pipe network from boiler to engine
- Steam engine at position(-2.5,24.5)
- Connected electric poles distributing power

### Research Facility (Position y=28.5-31.5)
Consists of:
- Lab (position not directly specified)
- Burner inserter at position(0.5,30.5)
- Input chest at position(0.5,31.5) containing science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Shortage Errors
- Ensure sufficient raw materials are available before attempting crafting operations
- Monitor copper plate levels for automation science pack production
- Keep track of iron ore inventory to maintain continuous smelting

### Assembly Machine Resource Management
- Electronic circuit assembly machine shows copper cable shortage - ensure consistent supply of ingredients
- Monitor input chest inventory levels to maintain continuous production

### Power System Management
- Keep coal supply steady in boiler to maintain consistent power generation
- Monitor coal levels in burner inserters to prevent work interruption

### Crafting System Limitations
- Remember that copper plates can only be produced in furnaces, not through direct crafting
- Plan production chains considering the requirement for proper facilities for intermediate products
